description: Floor(6*n*sqrt(n)/Pi^2) - sigma(n), where sigma(n) is the sum of the divisors of n (A000203).
references: D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Handbook of Number Theory, Kluwer, Section III.1.1.b.
prog: (PARI) a(n)=6*n*sqrt(n)\Pi^2 - sigma(n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 14 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 29 2000
